title: CSS Margin Properties
description: CSS margin properties fully compliant with CSS specifications

margin.description: Shorthand property that sets margins on all four sides

marginTop.description: Sets the margin area on the top side of an element

marginRight.description: Sets the margin area on the right side of an element

marginBottom.description: Sets the margin area on the bottom side of an element

marginLeft.description: Sets the margin area on the left side of an element

marginBlock.description: Logical property that sets the block-start and block-end margins

marginInline.description: Logical property that sets the inline-start and inline-end margins

marginBlockStart.description: Logical property that sets the margin in the block-start direction

marginBlockEnd.description: Logical property that sets the margin in the block-end direction

marginInlineStart.description: Logical property that sets the margin in the inline-start direction

marginInlineEnd.description: Logical property that sets the margin in the inline-end direction
